## Toolbox.selectItem\_() method

Selects the given item, marks it selected, and updates aria state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected selectItem_(oldItem: ISelectableToolboxItem | null, newItem: ISelectableToolboxItem): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  oldItem | [ISelectableToolboxItem](./blockly.iselectabletoolboxitem.md) \| null | The previously selected toolbox item. |
|  newItem | [ISelectableToolboxItem](./blockly.iselectabletoolboxitem.md) | The newly selected toolbox item. |

**Returns:**

void
